title: Science Inquiry Project Through Interactive Group Activities

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Learning environments combining group discussions and hands-on experiments in smartphone-centric limited-technology settings

learning_goals: Learners can conduct dialogue-based experimental designs explaining scientific phenomena with over 80% accuracy
Learners can revise and improve their PBL deliverables (reports/models) three or more times by incorporating peer feedback.

Learners can apply the 5-step questioning framework (observation-hypothesis-verification-analysis-conclusion) required for scientific argumentation with a frequency of 70% or higher during group discussions.

resources: Smartphone collaboration apps (Google Docs, Padlet, etc.)
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
